title: (x) 'Hobgood Peatross': eroded caps - Schneidler Initials {Mark S, Riccardo}
content:
All I have is this bad fax copy.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Hobgood scan cleaned.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202125917/http:/typophile.com/files/Hobgood%20scan%20cleaned.jpg) | 40.54 KB |
author: hworkman

comments.content: Looks like Schneidler Initials to me. [Shango](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202125917/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/shango/) is the closest digital version I can find.
Ah, I saw that, but it looked like it didn't include the short-tailed R. Should have looked closer.
